about.title: About me
about.subtitle: Technology and photography lover. Software Development Engineer - Sidra Data Platform at Plain Concepts. ITI student at UNED.
about.learning-description: Strong learning and problem solving abilities. Throughout my career I have faced a great number of challenges, which has allowed me to develop a working method that accelerates the learning and understanding process.
about.net-description: I'm specialized in the development of backend solutions using Microsoft technologies and I am an expert in C# language and I also have the MSCD: App Builder certification.
about.backend-description: Experience in creating application with architectures that run in the cloud or on classic servers. I'm Azure certified and continually explore new technologies.
about.passion-description: My passion for technology leads me to engage on continuous learning and looking for new challenges that allow me to evolve as a professional.

portfolio.title: Portfolio
portfolio.subtitle: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet consectetur.

career.title: Experience
career.subtitle: A brief history of my career
career.item0.title: Beginnings
career.item0.description: I discover computer science, specifically programming at the Institute thanks to a fantastic teacher and I am hooked. Computer books and blogs appear in my life, I even give a programming class to my classmates.
career.item1.title: Student CFGS (Vocational Studies)
career.item1.description: I started my path in computing by studying vocational Studies in Multiplatform Applications Development.
career.item2.title: I join Clarcat
career.item2.description: I begin my professional experience as a programmer at Clarcat where I work on multiple projects for clients such as Arcelormittal or Telecable.
career.item3.title: International support and Deployment
career.item3.description: I participate in the implementation and travel to the Arcelormittal facilities in Trinidad and Tobago to train personnel.
career.item4.title: English title B2
career.item4.description: I obtain the B2 title by completing my English studies at the language school.
career.item5.title: I join Izertis
career.item5.description: My search for new challenges takes me to Izertis where for the first time I work developing mobile and web applications.
career.item6.title: I join Clarcat
career.item6.description: I join Clarcat to participate in an important Stock Optimization project, in which I work with algorithms and complex data structures. I collaborate closely with the client to define requirements and meet goals.
career.item7.title: Promotion to Team Leader
career.item8.title: Microsoft C# Certification
career.item8.description: As accreditation of my experience in C# it achieve C# Certification, also I get the MCSD: App Builder Certification.
career.item9.title: Start Degree of Engineering in Information Technology
career.item9.description: I start studying for the Degree of Engineering in Information Technology on UNED, while continuing to work.
career.item10.title: Microsoft Azure Developer Associate Certification
career.item10.description: I get the certification that proves my knowledge of application development in Azure.
career.item11.title: Microsoft Azure DevOps Engineer Certification
career.item11.description: I complete the Developer certification with the specific part of DevOps giving me a better knowledge of the Azure environment.
career.item12.title: I join Plain Concepts
career.item12.description: Looking to advance in my career I join Sidra Data Platform team at Plain Concepts as a Software Development Engineer.
career.item13.title: Microsoft Azure Fundamentals Certifications
career.item13.description: I obtain three Fundamentals Certifications (AI, Data y Power Plataform) and continue improving my knowledge of Azure's Platform.

contact.title: Contact me
contact.subtitle: Want to get in touch? Leave me a message
contact.name: Name *
contact.name-validation-length: Name must have a length between 3 and 80 characters.
contact.phone-validation-length: Phone must have a maximum  length of 15 characters.
contact.message-validation-length: Email must have a length between 5 and 1000 characters.
contact.InvalidInput: Input is invalid, please make sure you haven't included special characters or html tags.
contact.InvalidArgument: Some arguments were invalid, please make sure to properly fill out the form.
contact.MissingArgument: Missing required fields, please fill out: Name, Email and Message.
